page.title: 12LARKHALL SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: LARKHALL ACADEMY IS THE ONLY SECONDARY SCHOOL IN LARKHALL.THE SCHOOL ACCOMODATES 1660 PUPILS AND HAS OVER 100 TEACHERS.L/ACADEMY IS SUPPLIED BY 9 PRIMARY SCHOOLS.THE NUMBER OF PUPILS STARTING AT LARKHALL IS,ON AVERAGE,283 PUPILS A YEAR.DISIPLINE IS KEPT BY SUSPENSION AND PUNISHMENT EXERCISES. MOST PUPILS WOULD PREFER THE BELT BROUGHT BACK BECAUSE IT IS QUICKER THAN SUSPENSION.THEY FIND PRACTICAL SUBJECTS SUCH AS WOODWORK AND ART MORE ENJOYABLE THAN MATHS AND ENGLISH. THERE ARE ABOUT 16 SUBJECTS TAUGHT IN L/ACADEMY RANGING FROM ACADEMIC SUBJECTS SUCH AS ENGLISH AND HISTORY,MATHS AND SCIENCES,ART AND PRACTICAL SUDJECTS. THE SCHOOL PROVIDES A COMMON ROOM AND CAFETERIA FOR 16+ PUPILS AND ALSO FOR RETURNING ADULTS DOING CERTIFICATE SUBJECTS.
